content.value:
Want to reinforce inclusive naming in your org? If you are in a meeting and hear terms that aren’t correct, politely pause the meeting, suggest a better term and resume the meeting. Do this every time.

Them: So this Kubernetes master node…
You: Do you mean control plane node?
content.html: Want to reinforce inclusive naming in your org? If you are in a meeting and hear terms that aren’t correct, politely pause the meeting, suggest a better term and resume the meeting. Do this every time. Them: So this Kubernetes master node… You: Do you mean control plane node?
